channel.title: Ben's Bargains - Latest Headlines
channel.description: Where ghetto dogs come for the lowdown on deals

item.title: Pandigital R90A200 WiFi 9" Android eReader $70 at Walmart
item.description:
Walmart has the Pandigital R90A200 Wi-Fi Color Multimedia eReader Android 2.0 Tablet for $70 with free shipping. [Compare]

  • 9" 400x800 resistive touchscreen, 2GB internal memory
  • 802.11b/g/n, Android 2.0 OS, 1.28lbs, microSD card slot

item.title: Manfrotto MB SSC3-1BB AGILE I DSLR Sling Bag $36 at Amazon
item.description: Amazon has the Manfrotto MB SSC3-1BB AGILE I DSLR Sling Bag for $36 with free shipping. Stores a DSLR camera with lens attached and has an upper compartment for accessories and a front strap for the tripod. [Compare]

item.title: 2-pack Swiss+Tech 61010 7-in-1 Mini Tool Set $18 at Amazon
item.description: Amazon has the 2-pack Swiss+Tech 61010 7-in-1 Mini Tool Gift Set for $18 with free shipping on $25+. Includes two gift sets of three Swiss+Tech tools each. [Compare]

item.title: HP Pavilion dv7 Quad Core 17.3" LED Notebook $450 at Newegg
item.description:
Today only. Newegg has the refurbished HP Pavilion dv7-6113cl Quad Core 17.3" LED Notebook for $450 with free shipping. [Compare]

  • AMD A6-3400M Quad Core 1.4GHz CPU, 6GB RAM, 750GB HDD
  • 17.3" 1600x900 LED, ATI Radeon HD 6520G, VGA & HDMI
  • SuperMulti, Beats Audio, 9-cell, Windows 7 HP x64

item.title: Current Offers and Promotions at Home Depot
item.description:
In preparation for Father's Day, Home Depot is offering the following offers and promotions:

  • $5 off $50 or More w/ code THDDAD5 [Exp 6/10]
  • $20 off Bosch Purchases $100+ w/ code BOSCH [Exp 6/23]
  • $20 off Dewalt Purchases $100+ w/ code DEWALT [Exp 6/17]
  • $10 off Dremel Purchases $125+ w/ code DREMEL [Exp 6/23]
  • $25 off Milwaukee M18 Combo Kits w/ MILWAUKEE25 [Exp 6/30]
  • $20 off Rotozip Purchases $100+ w/ code ROTOZIP [Exp 6/23]
  • $10 off Rotozip Purchases $50+ w/ code ROTOZIP [Exp 6/23]
  • $40 off Bosch Purchases $200+ w/ code BOSCH [Exp 6/23]
  • $10 off Skil Purchases $50+ w/ code SKIL [Exp 6/23]

item.title: 2-Nights Palms Resort Las Vegas for Two $118 at BookIt
item.description: Through June 11th, BookIt is offering 2-night stays at Palms Casino Resort in Las Vegas for two adults for $118. Includes daily breakfast buffet. Amenities include pools, spas, salons, 6 onsite restaurants, and fitness center. Book by 6/10 for travel by 11/30.

item.title: Up to 50% off Shoes + Extra 15% off + Free Shipping at Running Warehouse
item.description: Running Warehouse is taking up to 50% (or more) off select men's running shoes. Plus, receive an extra 15% off with coupon code FB15D. Two-day shipping and returns are free. The pictured Asics Piranha SP 3 Men's Shoes are now on sale for $60 - 15% off code = $51 with free shipping.

item.title: 3M Headlight Lens Restoration System $7.29 at Amazon
item.description: Amazon has the 3M Headlight Lens Restoration System for $14 - 15% off with Subscribe & Save (can cancel at anytime) - $5 rebate [Exp 6/30] = $7.29 with free shipping. Restores headlights by removing scratches, yellowing and hazing. [Compare]

item.title: ADATA DashDrive 500GB USB 3.0 Waterproof Portable HDD $70 at Newegg
item.description: Newegg has the ADATA AHD710-500GU3 DashDrive Durable Series HD710 500GB USB 3.0 Water & Shock Proof Portable Hard Drive (Black, Yellow or Blue) for $90 - $10 off with coupon code ADATA66 [Exp 6/11] - $10 rebate [Exp 6/17] = $70 with free shipping. Features military-grade waterproof and shockproof construction, and a wrap around USB cable. [Compare]

item.title: Hometrends Tropical Palm 5-Piece Conversation Set $298 at Walmart
item.description: Walmart has the Hometrends Tropical Palm 5-Piece Conversation Set (Tan or Green) for $298 with free site-to-store shipping or $80 shipping to home. Features Includes 38" x 38" table, four sling support steel frame chairs, and four cushions. [Compare]

item.title: Dell Vostro 470 3rd Gen i5 4GB Win 7 Pro Desktop $549 at Dell Business
item.description:
Dell Business has the Dell Vostro 470 3rd Generation Intel Core i5 4GB Win 7 Pro Desktop for $599 - $50 off with coupon code W9D06J14FX10WM [Exp 6/30] = $549 with free shipping. [Compare]

  • 3rd Gen Intel Core i5-3450 3.10GHz, 4GB RAM, 500GB HDD
  • Intel HD 2500, 802.11n, Bluetooth v4.0+LE, Win 7 Pro x64

item.title: 25,000 Bonus Points w/ Ink Classic Business Card at Chase
item.description: Chase is offering 10,000 bonus points with a first purchase and 15,000 bonus points after $5000 of qualifying purchases in the first 3 months as a new Chase Ink Classic Business cardmember. The card also offers 5 points per dollar on the first $25,000 spent annually on eligible business purchases. No annual fee.

item.title: Wiley X Quake Sunglasses $31 at Bargain Outfitters
item.description: Bargain Outfitters has the Wiley X Quake Sunglasses for $25 + $6 shipping = $31 shipped. Features 100% UVA and UVB protection, triloid nylon frames, and Selenite lenses that surpass the ANSI Z87.1-2003 standard for flammability and high-velocity impact standards. [Compare]

item.title: Dell Inspiron 11z Core i3 11.6" Notebook + OCZ 60GB SSD $350 at Newegg
item.description:
Newegg has the Dell Inspiron 11z iM101z-3980BK Core i3 11.6" Notebook (Obsidian Black) + OCZ Agility 3 AGT3-25SAT3-60G 2.5" 60GB SATA III SSD for $360 - $10 rebate [Exp 6/15] = $350 with free shipping. Windows 7 Home Premium installed. [Compare]

  • Intel Core i3-330UM 1.20GHz, 2GB DDR3, 250GB HDD
  • Intel GMA HD, 11.6" WLED (1366x768), webcam, 6-cell

item.title: 3W 220LM Aluminum Alloy LED Flashlight $6.69 at DinoDirect
item.description: DinoDirect has the Star Light 1-Mode 3W 220Lumens LED Aluminum Alloy Shell Flashlight for $6.69 with free shipping. Features high output, extended runtime, powered by three AAA batteries, and resists crushing or bending. [Compare]

item.title: Logitech Rechargeable Tablet Clip-On Speaker $22 at eBay
item.description: eBay with netDirect Bargains has the Logitech Rechargeable Tablet Clip-On Speaker (984-000193) for $22 with free shipping. Features 3.5mm audio jack, eight hours of battery life, and USB to mini-USB charging cable. [Compare]

item.title: 25% off Refurb 14", 15", and 17" XPS Laptops at Dell Outlet
item.description:
Through June 12th, Dell Outlet is currently taking 25% off any refurbished 14", 15", or 17" XPS Laptop with coupon code TM9QM5WVJW?518. Outlet shipping is free on any refurbished system.
  • 25% off refurb Inspiron All-in-One Desktops w/ code
    6K4BH32FSFSGLQ
  • 25% off refurb Alienware Laptops and Desktops w/ code RG3X38B6P6L62W
  • 20% off refurb Dell Inspiron 570 or 620 Desktops w/ code 22SGGS9D6N834G

item.title: Linksys E4200 Simultaneous Dual-Band 802.11n Router $80 at Cisco
item.description: Cisco has the refurbished Cisco-Linksys E4200-RM Maximum Performance Dual-Band Wireless-N Router for $80 with free shipping. Features simultaneous 2.4 and 5 GHz bands, optimized for home theater streaming, parental controls, built-in UPnP A/V media server, can create separate networks for guests, and internal 3x3 MIMO antenna array. eBay with Cisco also has it for the same price. [Compare]

item.title: Up to 70% off Outlet + Extra $15 off $75+ at Eastbay
item.description: Eastbay is taking up to 70% off their outlet items. Plus, receive an extra $15 off orders $75 or more with coupon code URLEB262 [Exp 6/28]. Alternatively, take 10% off orders $50+ with URLEB26C, 15% off $75+ with URLEB26E or $20 off $120+ with URLEB264. Shipping starts at $7; certain exclusions may apply.

item.title: Seagate GoFlex Desk 2TB USB 3.0 External HDD $110 at Dell Business
item.description: Dell Business has the Seagate GoFlex Desk Kit 2TB USB 3.0 Black External Hard Drive (STAC2000106) for $110 with free shipping. Add to cart to view discounted price. Features 7200RPM drive speed. Measures 6.22"L x 4.88"W x 1.73"D. [Compare]
